author: Jan Christensen
content: This is what I wrote when I posted it on my Facebook page: “In honor of a courageous woman, one of those human beings we’ve never met before, whose life reminds us of how we can reach for and try to find our own best within.”

author: Dave S
content: Great story and a great gal. Hilary is very inspiring. I did not know about her until this article. Thank you for posting it. I’m bipolar and when I’m very depressed sailing will always bring me out of it. And when I’m manic I’m ready to round Cape Horn in an open boat.
